short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: a chrome extension that helps you find the best deals on everything you want to buy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wishbeep is a Chrome extension that helps users find the lowest prices on the products they want to buy. The extension provides notifications when prices drop on specific products. Users can add products to their watchlist and receive email alerts when prices drop, or deals become available. 

The extension supports various categories, including electronics, fashion, home goods, and more. Overall, Wishbeep's Chrome extension is a valuable tool for anyone looking to save money online shopping. Its intuitive interface, and functional features make it easy to find the best price for users' desired products.
